analysis.description:
KittyKendoCore.recordVotes has external calls inside a loop:
	- kks.proposalExists(votes[i]) (/unique_chucks/18/0xaa82f3f0ff5026aba2224a95a5f493ac4074bc06.sol#161-178)

KittyKendoCore.recordVotes has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(kks.proposalOwner(votes[i]) != msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/18/0xaa82f3f0ff5026aba2224a95a5f493ac4074bc06.sol#162-166)

KittyKendoCore.recordVotes has external calls inside a loop:
	- kks.proposalCreateTime(votes[i]) + kks.getProposalTTL() <= now (/unique_chucks/18/0xaa82f3f0ff5026aba2224a95a5f493ac4074bc06.sol#167-169)

KittyKendoCore.recordVotes has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(kks.getProposalVoterVotesCount(votes[i],msg.sender) == uint256(0)) (/unique_chucks/18/0xaa82f3f0ff5026aba2224a95a5f493ac4074bc06.sol#170-174)

KittyKendoCore.recordVotes has external calls inside a loop:
	- kks.addProposalVote(votes[i],msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/18/0xaa82f3f0ff5026aba2224a95a5f493ac4074bc06.sol#177-178)

KittyKendoCore.recordVotes has external calls inside a loop:
	- kks.addVoterVote(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/18/0xaa82f3f0ff5026aba2224a95a5f493ac4074bc06.sol#180-181)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/18/0xaa82f3f0ff5026aba2224a95a5f493ac4074bc06.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/18/0xaa82f3f0ff5026aba2224a95a5f493ac4074bc06.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '' of ICKBase.ownerOf (/unique_chucks/18/0xaa82f3f0ff5026aba2224a95a5f493ac4074bc06.sol#32) is not in mixedCase
